solution_line_template: The team's total number of goalies and defenders is {goalies}+{defenders} = <<{goalies}+{defenders}={goalies_and_defenders}>>{goalies_and_defenders}.

The number of midfielders in the team is twice the number of defenders, which means there are {midfielder_multiplier}*{defenders}=<<{midfielder_multiplier}*{defenders}={midfielders}>>{midfielders} defenders in the team.

The total number of players in the team playing the positions of goalies, defenders and midfielders is {midfielders}+{goalies_and_defenders} = <<{midfielders}+{goalies_and_defenders}={total_non_strikers}>>{total_non_strikers}
If there are {total_players} players in the team, then the number of strikes in the team is {total_players}-{total_non_strikers} = <<{total_players}-{total_non_strikers}={strikers}>>{strikers}
